alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Lafayette; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 9:15PM CDT until June 03 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Missouri River at Waverly affecting Saline, Lafayette and Carroll Counties. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Missouri River at Waverly. * WHEN...Until Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 23.5 feet, Rural areas along the river which are not protected by levees flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 21.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening and continue falling to 13.7 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat 1am 1am 1am Missouri River Waverly 20.0 21.9 Wed 9pm 21.9 19.1 15.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
